on_board_title1: We’ll reach you faster than anyone
on_board_desc1: Book your ride in seconds, and our nearest drivers will arrive quickly so you can start your trip without waiting or being late.
on_board_desc2: Book your ride with peace of mind — clean cars and professional drivers ensure you a comfortable and safe journey from start to finish.
on_board_desc3: After each ride, rate the driver and help us maintain top service and build stronger trust between passengers and drivers.
select_this_driver_sure: Are you sure you want to select this driver?
load_shipment_sure: Are you sure you want to load this shipment?
delete_shipment_sure: Are you sure you want to delete this shipment?
deliver_shipment_sure: Are you sure you want to deliver this shipment?
deliver_shipment_sure_desc: This shipment will be delivered by the Exporter, are you sure you want to continue?
waiting_for_exporter_confirmation: Waiting for Exporter Confirmation to deliver the shipment
confirm_delete_account: Do you want to delete your account?
confirm_logout: Do you want to log out?
exit_app_desc: Are you sure you want to exit the app?
error_happened: An error occurred during the operation, please try again.
background_permission_required: Background location access permission is required to continuously track location.
foreground_permission_required: Location access permission is required to enable this feature.
location_describtion: Please enable location permission to access this feature
fill_data_to_enter: Fill in your details to log in
verify_code_msg: A verification code will be sent to your WhatsApp number
ener_verification_Code: Enter the verification code sent to your number to recover your password.
ener_verification_Code2: Enter the verification code sent to your number to verify your account.
not_identical_password: Password and confirmation password do not match
welcome_desc: Fill in your details to register with us now
name: Name
enter_shipment_desc: Shipment details to help vehicle owners understand your request
subject: Subject
delete_message: Do you want to delete the message?
you_are_didnt_upload_export_card_please_: Please note that the exporter card has not been uploaded yet; please upload it as soon as possible.
you_are_didnt_upload_driver_card_please_: Please note that the driver’s license has not been uploaded yet; please upload it as soon as possible.
you_are_didnt_upload_countries: Please note that export countries have not been uploaded yet; please upload them as soon as possible.
enter_valid_size: Please enter the cargo volume correctly
enter_valid_number: Please enter a valid phone number
